Bruins 2, Penguins 1 (2D OT) > Bruins Lead Series 3-0

Bruins beat Penguins in double-overtime thriller

A goal by Patrice Bergeron in double overtime gave the Bruins what can be described as an epic win over the Penguins. The Bruins now lead the Eastern Final series 3-0.

Report: NSA collecting phone records

The National Security Agency is collecting the telephone records of millions of US Verizon customers under secret court order, according to Britain's The Guardian newspaper.
  • Read The Guardian story

'Martha Speaks' author sues WGBH

Author and illustrator Susan Meddaugh, whose books inspired the children's TV show, is suing WGBH for a slice of more than $20 million in donations the PBS affiliate receives from its audience annually.
